display_long_description:
Table Troopers puts you in command of a **fully destructible** battlefield, blending **physics-based** action and turn-based combat with intuitive controls.

Command quirky characters and **wield powerful weapons** to defeat your enemies!

# Cause massive damage
[media]

Strategize with friends or against the AI, and master physics-based weapons where wind, angles, and the environment affect every shot. 

# Blow up everything
[media]

# Use powerful airstrikes
[media]

Enjoy hilarious mishaps, epic victories, and unpredictable outcomes with a wild arsenal of gadgets. 

# Play online with your friends
[media]

Perfect for social gatherings, it offers strategic depth and accessibility for all players, casual or competitive.

# Key Features:
**Singleplayer Campaign:** Blast through three chapters

**Multiplayer:** Play online with your friends

**Tactical Combat:** Turn-based strategy with physics-driven chaos and destructible environments.

**Physics based Action:** Use your skill to aim and unleash physics-driven chaos

**Destructible Environments:** Blow up the whole level

**Plenty of Weapons:** Use a variety of weapons with different characteristics

**Mixed Reality:** A dynamic battlefield merges your room with the virtual world or play fully immersive in VR

**Fun Moments:** Laugh-out-loud mishaps and epic wins.

# Get involved and join our Discord: 🔗 **https://discord.tabletroopers.com**
